About

Thanks for clicking the “About” link. I’ll write a little bit about myself and why I started this blog in the future, but for now I’ll just leave you with the technical side.

This website is kindly hosted ad-free and at no cost by GitHub Pages. It uses the Jekyll static site generator, with the template provided by gh-pages-blog created by TheDereck. The Bootswatch theme used is Cerulean.
